mapper.sql: RSRC_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, RSRC_TYPE_ID, RSRC_NAME, RSRC_PATH, RSRC_INFO, RSRC_LOGO_URL
mapper.select: select RSRC_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, RSRC_TYPE_ID, RSRC_NAME, RSRC_PATH, RSRC_INFO, RSRC_LOGO_URL from resource_data
select RSRC_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, RSRC_TYPE_ID, RSRC_NAME, RSRC_PATH, RSRC_INFO, RSRC_LOGO_URL from resource_data where SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into resource_data (RSRC_ID, SUBJ_UNIT_ID, RSRC_TYPE_ID, RSRC_NAME, RSRC_PATH, RSRC_INFO, RSRC_LOGO_URL) values (#{rsrcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsrcTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsrcPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsrcInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rsrcLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update resource_data
SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSRC_TYPE_ID = #{rsrcTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSRC_NAME = #{rsrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSRC_PATH = #{rsrcPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSRC_INFO = #{rsrcInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RSRC_LOGO_URL = #{rsrcLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where RSRC_ID = #{rsrcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update resource_data set SUBJ_UNIT_ID = #{subjUnitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSRC_TYPE_ID = #{rsrcTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSRC_NAME = #{rsrcName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSRC_PATH = #{rsrcPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSRC_INFO = #{rsrcInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RSRC_LOGO_URL = #{rsrcLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RSRC_ID = #{rsrcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
